title: TmsT + Lemon Demon = MONKEY BUSINESS!!
content:
[url=http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/310209]www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/310209[/url]

My new Lemon Demon movie actually has some music from Commander Keen hidden in the 2nd lot of bonus footage, accessible via the "easter egg". There are hidden instructions elsewhere on HOW to find the easter egg. Or, you could just keep an eye out for things that seem to stand out like they don't quite belong, and then pause the movie and click on them.----------
www.StrifeStrips.com! Woot! We're back, baby!

title: Re: TmsT + Lemon Demon = MONKEY BUSNIESS!!

title: Re: TmsT + Lemon Demon = MONKEY BUSNIESS!!
content:
I'm better known to the LD community by my email alias, slightlyoddguy. This is part of why I need to think up a standardized name one of these days.

As for the easter eggs, one of them requires that you click something that's rather out of place. The other is in the standard TMST flash secret spot. If you don't know where that is, well, happy hunting.

EDIT: I just looked and noticed that you actually replied to my psuedo-review there.

*glee*

title: hehe
content: While I don't like Pico himself much, I always appreciate TMST's style of animation.  He's got such awesome facial detail!
